trans-unit.source: Enable the checkbox to hide this record in Frontend and mark it as hidden in the Backend
We deliver diffent kinds of marker. Choose one and confirm the following message to switch into another type.

For now we deliver 4 different kinds of Markers. Please select between Point, Range, Route and Area. Maybe you must confirm the message, that the fields will be changed while switching to another type.
A title for better identifying this record in TYPO3 Backend
